trans-unit.source: Defines a segment of time that may contain child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Define um segmento de tempo que pode conter objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> filho.

trans-unit.source: These child timelines become active according to their respective <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: Essas linhas do tempo filho ficam ativas de acordo com suas respectivas propriedades <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />.

trans-unit.source: Also, child timelines are able to overlap (run in parallel) with each other.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, as linhas do tempo filho podem ser sobrepostas (executadas em paralelo).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> objects can be children (nested inside) of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> objetos podem ser filhos (aninhados) de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: This can provide better encapsulation of timing sequences in complex animations.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode fornecer melhor encapsulamento de sequências de tempo em animações complexas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> has its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> property therefore all child timeline <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> values are relative to the parent <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> value for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> tem seu próprio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> propriedade, portanto, todos os filhos linha do tempo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> são valores em relação ao pai <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> valor para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e referências de recurso (mas eles não podem mais resolver), mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem tiver sido <see langword="true." />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências a recursos, vinculações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas seus valores atuais são.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem tiver sido <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
trans-unit.target: O novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CreateInstanceCore%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> to return the natural duration from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> do qual retornar a duração natural.

trans-unit.source: Return the natural duration (duration of a single iteration) from a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a duração natural (duração de uma única iteração) de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> quantity representing the natural duration.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> que representa a duração natural.

trans-unit.source: A natural duration is the period of a single iteration.
trans-unit.target: Uma duração natural é o período de uma única iteração.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> it means that the natural duration is unknown.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método retornar <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> significa que a duração natural é desconhecida.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> is determined by the author.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.NaturalDuration%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> é determinado pelo autor.

trans-unit.source: For example, the duration of streaming media would be determined by the provider of the streaming media.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a duração de streaming de mídia deve ser determinada pelo provedor de streaming de mídia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> children slips.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o comportamento dessa linha do tempo quando um ou mais dos seus <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> filhos se desvia.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how this timeline will behave when one or more of its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> children slips.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica como essa linha do tempo se comportará quando um ou mais dos seus <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> guias de filhos.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow" />.

trans-unit.source: It is often desirable to synchronize animations and media.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente é desejável para sincronizar animações e mídia.

trans-unit.source: However, this is complicated by the fact that media playback can be delayed by loading or buffering making it difficult to reliably play an animation along with media.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, isso é complicado pelo fato de que a reprodução de mídia pode ser atrasada por carregar ou armazenamento em buffer, dificultando a confiável reproduzir uma animação junto com a mídia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> property is used to determine what happens when media and animations are played together.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> propriedade é usada para determinar o que acontece quando a mídia e animações são executadas juntos.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> (default) specifies that animation timelines do not need to be synced and will play when specified regardless of the state of other media in the timeline.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> (padrão) Especifica que linhas de tempo da animação não precisam ser sincronizados e serão executado quando especificado, independentemente do estado de outras mídias na linha do tempo.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip> on the other hand, specifies that an animation will wait (slip) until media is ready to play.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip> por outro lado, especifica que uma animação aguardará (guia) até que a mídia está pronta para reprodução.

trans-unit.source: The diagrams below illustrate this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Os diagramas abaixo ilustram esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> plays a video and an animation.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reproduz um vídeo e uma animação.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> grows to play all media and animations.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> e o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> aumenta para reproduzir todas as mídias e animações.

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "Diagram: Key for SlipBehavior diagram")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: A chave para o Diagrama SlipBehavior](~/add/media/slipbehaviorkey.png "diagrama: chave para o Diagrama SlipBehavior")

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: Valor de propriedade SlipBehavior de expansão](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow1.png "diagrama: valor da propriedade SlipBehavior de expansão")

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds which gives media and animations 5 seconds to play regardless of how much they slip.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> tem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Grow> e um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> de 5 segundos, que fornece 5 segundos de mídia e animações reproduzir independentemente de quanto de guia.

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property value of Grow")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: Valor de propriedade SlipBehavior de expansão](~/add/media/slipbehaviorgrow2.png "diagrama: valor da propriedade SlipBehavior de expansão")

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip>.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> tem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip>.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> (and any other non-media children of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) does not progress unless the media timeline is also progressing.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> (e nenhum outro filho de mídia não o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>) não progride, a menos que a linha do tempo de mídia também está em andamento.

trans-unit.source: If the media takes a while to load, or if it is buffering, the animation will wait (slips) with it.
trans-unit.target: Se a mídia leva algum tempo para carregar ou se ele é armazenado em buffer, a animação aguardará (guias) com ele.

trans-unit.source: This allows animations to synchronize with a single media file.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que as animações sincronizar com um único arquivo de mídia.

trans-unit.source: ![SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "SlipBehavior diagram for media and animation")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama SlipBehavior para mídia e animação](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip1.png "Diagrama SlipBehavior para mídia e animação")

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> tem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SlipBehavior.Slip> e um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> de 5 segundos.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the media file and animation are guaranteed to play for 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Nesse cenário, o arquivo de mídia e animação são garantidos para reproduzir por 5 segundos.

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "Diagram: SlipBehavior property of a Storyboard")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama: Propriedade de SlipBehavior de um Storyboard](~/add/media/slipbehaviorslip2.png "diagrama: propriedade SlipBehavior de um Storyboard")

trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>.

trans-unit.source: [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
trans-unit.target: [Visão geral das propriedades da dependência](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
